trends: There has been one other sighting in Northampton
There were no other sightings in Northampton on or around December 4th 2011
Summary: steady at first, in a hovering style, then right to left, vertical, and back right, then straight vertical and gone in approximately 8 second duration
divs: Sighting DetailsMy husband and I went to pick my son up from his fathers house in rural Northampton, just west of LVIA. At approximately 6:15pm my son and I simultaneously witnessed two unidentified green-lit objects hovering near a field and then they abruptly zig-zagged and went quickly went vertical, then back right and vertical then completely disappeared. It was something that wasn't any type of aircraft our airforce could fly. The movements and flight pattern was definitely a ufo.
